page.title: 13GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
In the playground at school we play one two three in, it, ball games and bulldogs.
At home we play computer games, roller skating, cycling and skipping.
There is a ball game called 'sevensies'. To play this we do seven throws against the wall without dropping the ball; six throws against the wall letting the ball bounce once; five bounces on the ground without stopping; four throws under your leg letting it bounce once; three bounces on the ground and then against the wall; two throws in the air; one throw against the wall turn around and catch the ball without dropping it.
